summary:
•	Junior QA Manual tester
•	Defect Hunting and application of life cycle tools JIRA, Quality Center
•	Strong knowledge of SDLC, Test Plan and Test Case 
•	Basic knowledge of SQL
•	Expertise in white and black box testing
•	Installing, Configuring, and Troubleshooting MS Vista, Windows XP, Vista, Mac OS X
•	Knowledge of waterfall and agile methods
•	Ability to understand and interpret requirements specification in analyzing Business Requirements, System Requirement documents, blueprints for developing Test Plans and Test Cases
•	Excellence in writing test plans, test cases, and bug reports
•	Ability to execute, focus on results, strong teamwork skills, self-motivated and proactive
•	Strong work ethic, self-discipline and communication skills.

school.name: The Belarusian Institute of Law (Minsk, Belarus)

education.degree_name: Quality Assurance Software Manual Testing Courses

school.name: Harry S Truman College (Chicago, IL, USA)

education.degree_name: English as a Second Language courses

profile_positions.description:
Heavily involved in defect tracking, defect reporting and reproducing 
Developed Test Plan and Test Strategy documents for all the web based and server side applications
Developed Test Cases and Performed Manual Testing like Positive testing, Negative testing 
Performed Functional,Integration,System and Regression Testing
Tested application on different web browsers and different platforms for compatibility
Testing with multi user accounts for testing authentication and authorization of application
Interacted with developers to resolve the technical issues
Delivered Use Cases and other project based documentation to members of the integrated team 
Performed manual testing of the application functionality individually to complete black box testing of the application
Took part in the team bug review meeting
profile_positions.title: Software QA Analyst

profile_positions.location: 333 W Wacker Dr Ste L050, Chicago, IL, USA
profile_positions.description:
Gained hands-on experience in test case development, executing test case and reporting bug defects
Created and executed test plans,test cases and test scenarios in order to identify and address user problems and their causes while working on assimilated projects
Performed smoke,functional,integration,end-to-end and cross browser testing of the web and mobile healthcare application.
Design and usability testing of a web based medical application for patient engagement.
Performed informal and formal manual testing of the web application
Mobile testing of healthcare application using Android OS and iOS devices
Gained comprehensive knowledge of software quality assurance methodologies
Performed cross browser testing on Chrome, Safari,Firefox and IE
Heavily involved in defect tracking,defect reporting and reproducing
profile_positions.title: Software QA Tester

profile_positions.description:
Belarusian company that engages in selling wholesale and retail of textiles from the entire countries of the world, develop design and carry out sewing of any complication of wares from textile.

•	Courteously interacting with customers, as required.
•	Staying up to date on design trends.
•	Visiting international textile exhibitions.
•	Knowing markets and the relevant pricing.
•	Completing new customer contracts.	
•	Making of Final Accounts in Computer System.
•	Maintaining or exceed a minimum amount of sales.
•	Performing various routine adjustments to company documentations, records and logs.
•	Ensuring invoice payments.
•	Presenting the reports to the higher authorities.
•	Calculating the cost of production.
•	Performing various routine adjustments to company documentations, records and logs.
•	Calculation of wages.
•	Handling daily data entries, income/sales reports and sales receipts.
profile_positions.title: Designer and Sales Manager
